thread.title: McCarthy: To unite GOP, House needs ‘a new face’ PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: McCarthy: To unite GOP, House needs ‘a new face’ | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: McCarthy: To unite GOP, House needs ‘a new face’ PBS NewsHour
text: House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy, once favored to become Speaker of the House after John Boehner, abruptly withdrew from the competition, explaining that he believed Republicans should unite behind “a new face.” Political director Lisa Desjardins explores the fallout with Judy Woodruff.
